mapper.select: select w, wid, wpwd, writedate from webmaster where wid=#{wid} and wpwd=#{wpwd}
select u,uuid,uname,uaddr,utel,uemail,birth,upoint,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from member order by u desc
select m,mid,mname,mtel,memail,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from master order by m desc
select a,aname,atel,aaddr,atype,acheckin,acheckout,amaxreservedate,atheme,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from accomodation order by a desc
